casebody.data:
Ervin MARSHALL, Individually and on Behalf of His Acknowledged Minor Child Ervin Marshall, III
v.
Jared SANDIFER (Individually and in His Official Capacity as a Trooper with the Louisiana State Police), Michael D. Edmonson (Individually and in His Official Capacity as Colonel with the Louisiana State Police) and Louisiana State Police, Through Louisiana Department of Public Safety and Corrections NO. 2018-C-1907 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 11, 2019

Denied.
